bibl.title: Henry Carlton v. William Cochrane. Commitment
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court of the Third Judicial District of Washington Territory

body.p: In Justices Court before N. Soderberg, Justice of the Peace in and for Seattle Precinct, King County W.T.
Territory of Washington Plaintiff vs. Henry Carlton Defendant
Territory of Washington } ss. County of King
To the Hon. H.G. Thornton, Constable of said Precinct and the keeper of the Jail of said King County.

Whereas at the Justices Court held at my office in Seattle in said King County for the trial of Henry Carlton for the offense herein after stated the said Henry Carlton was convicted of having on the 13th day of April 1888 committed the crime of vagrancy by wilfully and unlawfully pursuing the business of gambling as a common gamester and upon conclusion the said bail did adjudge and determine that said Henry Colton should have the costs

herein taxed at $40.00 and stand committed for 13 days or until the same be paid and should give a bond or recognizance to the Territory of Washington with two sufficient surities in the sum of $250 for his good behavior for 3 months from April 14th 1888 the date of the judgement herein, and whereas said Henry Carlton has failed to pay said costs and has failed to give or furnish said or any bond or recognizance as in said judgement required; Therefore you the said H.G. Thornton are hereby commanded in the name of the United States forthwith to convey and deliver the said Henry Carlton to the said keeper and you the said keeper are hereby commanded to receive the said Henry Carlton into your custody in said jail and him there keep until he shall thence be discharged by due course of law.
Dated this 24th day of April 1888 N. Soderberg Justice of the Peace
Territory of Washington County of King
I hereby certify that by virtue of the within commitment I delivered the within named Henry Carlton into the custody of the keeper of Jail of King County W.T. this 23d day of April A.D. 1888
Territory of Washington vs. Henry Carlton
